thread.title: Russia says London refuses to provide access to Skripal case material

title: Russia says London refuses to provide access to Skripal case material
text:
Russia says London refuses to provide access to Skripal case material 12:45pm GMT - 01:26 
Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov said the British government has refused to give Moscow access to the case material relating to the spy poisoning case. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov said the British government has refused to give Moscow access to the case material relating to the spy poisoning case. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
